Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec™ Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Qx Amplified DNA Assay
Regulation Name(s): Neisseria spp. direct serological test reagents
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD ProbeTec Neisseria gonorrhoeae Qx Amplified DNA Assay utilizing strand displacement amplification on the BD Viper System for qualitative detection of N. gonorrhoeae DNA.
Indications for Use Summary: Direct, qualitative detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA in clinician-collected female endocervical and male urethral swabs, patient-collected vaginal swabs, and male and female urine to aid diagnosis of gonococcal urogenital disease in asymptomatic and symptomatic females and symptomatic males.
